General_review: Lofat is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Sandwiches, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Halifa, Adailiya and Airport.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Biryani, Baked Fries, Grilled Chicken Lettuce Wrap and Grilled Chicken Pasta, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Sandwiches, Breakfast.

General_review: Ahlah Ghadwah is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Arabic, Kuwaiti, Seafood that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Majboos, Balaleet, Majboos Arabic Meat and Mahashi Mix, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Arabic, Kuwaiti, Seafood.
They have been reviewed 3776 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: The Mandi Australian lamb was amazing! But it didn't come with yogurt like in the description.

General_review: Steak Master Restaurant is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Seafood, Japanese that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Chicken Dumpling, Salmon Teppanyaki, Spicy Chicken Miso Ramen and korean potato, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Seafood, Japanese.
They have been reviewed 17538 times by talabat users, with a rating of 5.
Wendy's is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of American, Fast Food, Burgers that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Ahmadi, Ardhiya, Fahad Al Ahmed and Fahaheel.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Nuggets, Fries, Wendy's Single Sandwich and Beef Chili, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like American, Fast Food, Burgers.
They have been reviewed 47626 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Istanbuliyah is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Ice cream, Arabic sweets that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Ward, Jawzeya Box, Classic Istanbuliyah and Mix Istanbuliyah, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Ice cream, Arabic sweets.
They have been reviewed 4193 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Arzaag is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Kuwaiti, Seafood, Grills that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Chicken Machboos, Grape Leaves, Lamb Machboos and Greesh, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Kuwaiti, Seafood, Grills.
They have been reviewed 4894 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Their best selling dishes are Qatayef, Khechneh Cheese, Mabrouma and Umm ALI, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Arabic, Arabic sweets.
They have been reviewed 64326 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Teddy Bakery is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Cakes, Desserts that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Birthday Box 30, Birthday Box 28, Birthday Box 25 and Birthday Box 26, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Cakes, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 410 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Tekka Lumee is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Bahraini, Kebab, Grills that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya and Adan.
Their best selling dishes are Hummus, French Fries, Tekka Lumee and Kebab Special, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Bahraini, Kebab, Grills.
They have been reviewed 4544 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Yelo! Pizza is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pizza, American, Fast Food that delivers across Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Hasaniya, Adailiya, Ardhiya and Ashbeliah.

Their best selling dishes are Baked Wedges, Margherita Pizza (Thin - Pan - NY), Soft Drinks and All for One - Good for 1, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pizza, American, Fast Food.
They have been reviewed 25028 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Golden Wok Chinese is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Indian, Seafood that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya, Adan and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Shrimp Fried Rice, Sweet & Sour Chicken, Chicken Fried Rice and Kindo Chicken, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Indian, Seafood.
They have been reviewed 4144 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: KAI Asian Diner is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Chinese, Thai, Asian that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Crunchy Korean Kickers Bowl, Chicken Katsu, Sushi Super Combo and Mongolian Beef, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Chinese, Thai, Asian.

They have been reviewed 6494 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: السويت سيء ويابس والفطاير بعد يابسة
الككاو اللب مكتوب فيه عيدكم مبارك متكسر مفروض انها ع شكل شريطة // و الككاو مو مترتب شكله طايح
للأسف طلبت منهم لقيمات جبن وصلت مفشفشة وماتقرمش وشكلها قديمة تحربة سيئة
كان الطلب قديم وليس فرش وعدم وضع قفشات مع الطلب
اللقيمات ناقعة وايدشيرة اكثر من اللازم والجبن ماله اثر ما انصح بشرائها ما تستاهل سعرها
حلاو خرباان محد اكله طعم سيء !!!
الكميه قليله مقارنه بالسعر الغالي جدا
سيء جدا وفيه حشره داخل علبه البقلاوه ماحبيت
لا تعامل ولا طعم تم التواصل مع الفرع و الاسلوب سيء و لم يتم استرداد الطلب
الطلب غير مغلف والعلبه متسخه في الطلب غير مغلف
طلب فاشل متاخر ودافعه الحساب والسايق ساعه عند الباب يقول مو دافعين السايق فاشل بالتعالمب
تاريخ الصلاحية تم ازالته من العلبة هذا الشي مومقبول يشكك بمصداقية المحل تأخر في توصيل الطلب
الحلا طعمه بايت مو حلو فيه ريحه وطعم الله يديم النعمه وعندي ناس تفشلت بالطعم
طلبت ورق عنب حجم كبير بعتولي الصغير
طلبت سويت الريم ب 5.500 وصلني سويت الاميره ب 5.000 ؟؟
القلاصات حيل صغيرة مع انه غالى
الحلو رووووعة ويبقى لعدة أيام وبرا الثلاجة اشحلاته بس الصمون الحشوات قليلة مع أن حشوة البطاط روعة
البسبوسة المذاق سئ ومتشربة بالشيرة جدا ومن الواضح أنها قديمة وتم ازالة تاريخ الصلاحية من قبل المحل
طعم الاكل قديم منذ يومين محفوظ و يابس و متغير اللون و الائحة و اخر مره نشتري من هذا المحل
طلبت حلو رهف وحلو مارشميلو الطعم قديم ماعجبني
اول مره اطلب منكم رهف والطعم مو اهو بايت وغير جذي الطبقه البيضا مو نفس كل مره ناقصها مكونات
ممكن مايعجني ويعجب غيري بس انا عن نفسي ماجازلي وجدان والملكة اقوى شي شكرا
وصل الطلب ناقص صوص الحلى اقول الطلب ناقص يقول انا موصله كامل
لم يتم خصم دينارين الموجودين في القسيمة عندي
البسبوسه ناشفه جدا ومافي طعم نهائيا
